Title: The people's commune is good, happiness will last for ten thousand years
Notes: Small farms are merged into people's communes, where private property ceases to exist and where all facilities are communal.The photograph of the musicians was published in China Reconstructs, October 1959 p.12, with the caption "Celebration of the 1958 bumper harvest at a people's commune in Anhwei [Anhui] province". The photographer is Tung Chang [Dong Zhang?].
